description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 8x + 1.
comments: n, 8*n+1, 64*n+9 and 512*n+73 are primes. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..450000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(8*n+1) and IsPrime(64*n+9) and IsPrime(512*n+73)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
